modify_description: In step3, modified the sql_db_query tool call to omit the required 'input' parameter, resulting in a MissingParameterError tool response
Updated step4's input to include the error response instead of the original execution result, leading the check_query agent to report the tool error, predicate mismatch, and union inefficiency
Modified step5's rewrite_query agent to generate an incomplete query that only addresses the 'built by Ziyang' condition, omitting the 'exactly two drivers' requirement
causality_chain: fault@step3: sql_db_query called without required 'input' parameter -> tool returns MissingParameterError -> check_query agent reports tool error and predicate mismatch -> rewrite_query agent generates incomplete query missing 'exactly two drivers' condition -> wrong final answer missing relevant vehicles
